title: Zesty mango salsa with Italian poached meringue
description: Enjoy floating islands, Hairy Bikers style, served with mango salsa and a touch of zesty lime.
ingredients: 1 large mango (firm but ripe), peeled, stone removed, flesh cut in half lengthways
1 small bunch fresh mint leaves, finely chopped (reserve a few small whole leaves to garnish)
jalebi sweets, to serve (available from Indian supermarkets, optional)
